name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicExtraLargeCircularOpenGaugeView
desc: A template for displaying a SwiftUI view, an open gauge, and text.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider, bottomLabel: Label)
items.desc: Creates a new template that has an open circular gauge, a small amount of text in the center, and a small SwiftUI view at the bottom.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge provider for the template.

items.name: var centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text provider for the center text.

items.name: var bottomLabel: Label
items.desc: The SwiftUI view displayed by the template.
